## Human Development Indicators

These data are downloaded from http://hdr.undp.org/en/data and in particular from http://hdr.undp.org/sites/default/files/2015_statistical_annex_tables_all.xls

Data are provided for 1980, 1985, 1990, 1995, 2000, 2005, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013 and 2014

```{r hdi1}
datatable(hdi)
```
